sample_recruitment: Convenience sample. Recruitment via social media and community organizations.

High-risk sample.  Survey panel sampling with Qualtrics to meet specific race, ethnicity, income and education quotas. Oversampled low-income population (50%), Black (50%), Hispanic (50%) and 50% high school education or less.
High-risk sample. Survey panel with oversampled low-income population, but representative on race and ethnicity  with Qualtrics.
Representative sample with survey panel (income) with Qualtrics.
Representative sample with survey panel (on race, ethnicity and income) with Qualtrics.

weighting: Household income, age, gender, race/ethnicity, education, geographic region
sample_recruitment: Representative sample with survey panel (on race, ethnicity, education, age, gender, geographic region) with oversampling of low- income population with Qualtrics.
Convenience sample. Recruitment via social media.
Representative sample with survey panel (on race, ethnicity) and oversampling of low-income population with Qualtrics.
Convenience sample. Recruitment via social media and community organizations.

High-risk sample. Nested quota via social media campaign, community-based organizations, convenience sample, and survey consumer panel sampling via Qualtrics to meet specific race/ethnicity, income and education quotas. This includes an oversampling of Blacks (50%), Hispanics (50%), high school education or less (50%), and low income (50% below $25,000 annual income before taxes).

High-risk sample. Non-proportional quota sample, recruited by Qualtrics. Oversampled low-income population (50%), Black (40%, Hispanic (40%), Native American (20%) and 50% high school education or less.
High-risk sample. Non--proportional quota sample recruited by Qualtrics. Quotas: low-income or low-education (50%), Black (50%) and Hispanic (50%).
Representative sample with survey panel (on race, ethnicity and income) with Qualtrics.

Convenience sample. Recruited Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) participants through state list-serv of current SNAP recipients.
